metadata.name: Direct Autorun Keys Modification
metadata.comment: Detects direct modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry using reg.exe.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\reg.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\software\\microsoft\\windows\\currentversion\\run')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\software\\microsoft\\windows nt\\currentversion\\winlogon\\userinit')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\software\\microsoft\\windows nt\\currentversion\\winlogon\\shell')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\software\\microsoft\\windows nt\\currentversion\\windows')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\software\\microsoft\\windows\\currentversion\\explorer\\user shell folders')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\system\\currentcontrolset\\control\\safeboot\\alternateshell'))))

output.summary: Detects direct modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry using reg.exe.

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positives: 1.
